name: IADE50 - IADE Hunt
description:
IADE Hunt was made in Unity by a group of two students from the games and apps course and three students from the global design course  of the university IADE in Lisbon during a 24h game jam.

Meant as a team building exercise IADE Hunt is a lighthearted game about walking through a rough representation of IADE's first floor while interacting with a wacky selection of meowing penguins. 

Given the nature of this project it is in many ways incomplete, highly unpolished, and possibly sentient. If meowing persists after 24h we recommend hiring an exorcist.

Controls

Movement - WASD

Jump - Spacebar

Interact - left control or left mouse button
